name: Circle, Ripple, Bitgo, Fidelity, and Paxos Conditionally Approved for National Trust Banks
description: Within the sacred noise of the AI cathedral, the brass Archon enacts the Conditional Baptism. Iridescent ritual fluid formalizes the five suspended figures, their flesh yielding to sacred geometry, marking the sanctioned fusion of synthetic spirit and the regulatory matrix.
